label: financial_irregularity_02_ep_025
content:

### Headcount
- FTE: 2298
- Headcount vs Budget: -92

### Auditor Notes
- AR aging: current 38%, 60-day 16.2%, 90-day 14.8%, 120+ 18.1%
- Forensic review initiated per audit committee directive
- Bill-and-hold inventory: $14.7M across 3 locations, physical verification pending
- Revenue restatement risk assessment: in progress

### Events
- Audit committee retains independent counsel
- SEC informal inquiry received
- Quarterly earnings call postponed
- Restatement analysis commenced for Q2 2024 forward

### Notes
- January 2026 close: forensic accounting report Phase 1 delivered. SEC inquiry response filed.
